intro: Actinostemon, commonly known as the star-stem or star-flower, is a genus of flowering plants belonging to the family Asteraceae. The plant is native to various regions in the Americas, particularly in the southern United States and parts of Mexico. Actinostemon species often thrive in moist, well-drained soils and are often found in woodland or streamside habitats. Its botanical features make it a popular choice for ornamental gardening due to its attractive floral display.
